parameters.name: recurrence
parameters.description: Recurrence rules if an event is recurrent

requests.request_body: {"data":{"type":"event","attributes":{"title":"Cupiditate incidunt eius.","description":"Recusandae quis adipisci. Veritatis sit quis. Neque et quidem. Sit non quo. Quia expedita aut.","status":"cancelled","start_at":"2019-02-13","end_at":"2019-02-15","timezone":"Etc/GMT+12","recurrence":["EXDATE;VALUE=DATE:20150610","RDATE;VALUE=DATE:20150609,20150611","RRULE:FREQ=DAILY;UNTIL=20150628;INTERVAL=3"]}}}
requests.curl:
curl "http://localhost:3000/api/v1/events" -d '{"data":{"type":"event","attributes":{"title":"Cupiditate incidunt eius.","description":"Recusandae quis adipisci. Veritatis sit quis. Neque et quidem. Sit non quo. Quia expedita aut.","status":"cancelled","start_at":"2019-02-13","end_at":"2019-02-15","timezone":"Etc/GMT+12","recurrence":["EXDATE;VALUE=DATE:20150610","RDATE;VALUE=DATE:20150609,20150611","RRULE:FREQ=DAILY;UNTIL=20150628;INTERVAL=3"]}}}' -X POST \
	-H "Accept: application/vnd.api+json" \
	-H "Content-Type: application/vnd.api+json" \
	-H "Authorization: Bearer 203471500a070bfdc2afd7f836ed0976a612eee3cc183922ae6732381a4f124a" \
	-H "Host: example.org" \
